subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Two members of Cuba’s national soccer team have gone missing during a trip to Washington for a World Cup qualifying match, the team’s coach said. The Washington Post identified the players as midfielder Pedro Faife, 24, and forward Reynier Alcantara, 26.
